TEI.2.document_title: Anthony Winston to Stephen F Austin, 01-03-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Anthony Winston to Austin, Tuscumbia, Ala., January 3, 1831. Explaining delay in moving to Texas. (Omitted.)
